channel.title: Cant change npc location or shop item amount?
channel.description: i changed the location of a fisherman to the id of a shop assistant and it did not work? i restarted and compiled and everything?

item.title: Cant change npc location or shop item amount?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

What are you talking about? If you mean you just replaced an NPC and the shop doesnâ€™t open, you need to change it in the client class NPC Click One or Two packet. Editing the items and amounts of the item in shops is found in shops.cfg, and as Darkning said changing the location of an NPC is in autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
item.source: Cant change npc location or shop item amount?
